game.name: Spring Tales
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Spring Tales는 아늑한 분위기의 2D 퍼즐 어드벤처 게임입니다. 블로섬데일 주민들이 봄 축제를 준비할 수 있도록 도와주세요. 따뜻한 이야기와 함께 공동체의 소중함을 느껴보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Spring Tales is a cozy 2D puzzle adventure game. Help the charming residents of Blossomdale prepare for their spring festival by solving puzzles, overcoming challenges, and rebuilding after a storm. Experience a heartwarming story filled with friendship, hope, and community spirit.
